pages.index: JuniorFit JuniorFit Home About Us Our Programs Prices Private Lessons Contact Welcome to JuniorFit Gymnastics Club Empowering young athletes through the art of gymnastics Kids Love JuniorFit Fun and engaging gymnastics classes Positive and supportive environment Experienced instructors Wide range of classes for different ages and skill levels Opportunity to learn new skills and build confidence Make new friends and have a great time! About Us Welcome to JuniorFit Gymnastics Club! Founded in 2005, JuniorFit has been a cornerstone of the community for over 15 years. Our mission is to inspire and empower young athletes through the art of gymnastics. Our History JuniorFit was established by former Olympic gymnast, Sarah Thompson, with a vision to create a nurturing environment where children can discover their passion for gymnastics. Over the years, we have grown into one of the most reputable gymnastics clubs in the region, with a strong focus on excellence, integrity, and fun. Our Team At JuniorFit, our team consists of dedicated coaches and staff who are committed to the success and well-being of every child. Our coaches bring a wealth of experience and expertise to the gym, ensuring that each student receives personalized attention and guidance. Our Programs We offer a wide range of programs for children of all ages and skill levels, including recreational classes, competitive teams, and special events. Whether your child is just starting out or aspiring to compete at the highest level, we have a program to suit their needs. Join Us Today Come join us at JuniorFit and discover the joy of gymnastics! With state-of-the-art facilities, top-notch coaching, and a supportive community, we are committed to helping every child reach their full potential. Enroll your child today and become a part of the JuniorFit family! Our Advantages Experienced Coaches Our team of experienced coaches is dedicated to helping every child reach their full potential. State-of-the-Art Facilities We provide state-of-the-art facilities equipped with the latest gymnastics equipment. Wide Range of Programs From recreational classes to competitive teams, we offer programs for children of all ages and skill levels. Focus on Fun At JuniorFit, we believe that gymnastics should be fun! Our classes are designed to inspire and engage children while building skills and confidence. Small Class Sizes We maintain small class sizes to ensure personalized attention and maximum learning opportunities for every child. Positive Environment Our gym fosters a positive and supportive environment where children can thrive both athletically and personally. Our Programs Recreational Gymnastics Fun and engaging classes for children of all ages and skill levels. Learn basic gymnastics skills while having a great time! Sign Up Competitive Teams For athletes looking to take their skills to the next level. Train with experienced coaches and compete at regional and national levels. Sign Up Rhythmic Gymnastics Combine dance and gymnastics to create beautiful routines. Develop flexibility, strength, and coordination in a creative environment. Sign Up Tumbling & Trampoline Learn flips, twists, and aerial skills in a safe and controlled environment. Perfect for thrill-seekers and aspiring acrobats! Sign Up Age Groups Ages 3-5 Our classes for ages 3-5 focus on fundamental movement skills and basic gymnastics exercises in a fun and engaging environment. Ages 6-8 Children aged 6-8 will build upon their foundational skills with more advanced gymnastics techniques and begin to develop strength and flexibility. Ages 9-12 For ages 9-12, our classes introduce more complex gymnastics elements and focus on refining skills and routines. Ages 13 and up Teenagers aged 13 and up can join our classes to further enhance their gymnastics abilities and pursue competitive opportunities. Private Lessons Unlock your full potential with personalized, one-on-one instruction from our experienced coaches. Whether you're a beginner looking to master the basics or an advanced gymnast aiming to perfect your skills, our private lessons are tailored to meet your specific needs and goals. Contact us today to schedule your private lesson! Price: $50 per session Book Now Gallery Prices Recreational Classes $50 per month $15 per class Competitive Teams $100 per month $25 per class Rhythmic Gymnastics $80 per month $20 per class Tumbling & Trampoline $60 per month $18 per class Artistic Gymnastics $70 per month $17 per class Aerial Silks $90 per month $22 per class Cheerleading $75 per month $19 per class Parkour $85 per month $21 per class Reviews "Amazing experience! My child loves attending JuniorFit. The coaches are fantastic and really care about the kids' progress." - Parent Name "JuniorFit has been great for my daughter. She's gained so much confidence since she started, and I've seen a big improvement in her skills." - Parent Name "Highly recommend JuniorFit to anyone looking for quality gymnastics classes. The facility is top-notch, and the coaches are wonderful!" - Parent Name "My son absolutely loves JuniorFit! The instructors are amazing, and he's learning so much while having fun." - Parent Name "JuniorFit has exceeded our expectations. The staff is friendly and supportive, and the facilities are great!" - Parent Name "We've tried other gymnastics clubs, but JuniorFit is by far the best. Our daughter looks forward to her classes every week." - Parent Name Frequently Asked Questions What age groups do you cater to? We offer classes for children aged 3 and up. Do you have classes for beginners? Yes, we have classes suitable for all skill levels, including beginners. How do I sign up for classes? You can sign up for classes by visiting our website and filling out the registration form. What should my child wear to class? We recommend wearing comfortable athletic clothing and bringing a water bottle. How often should my child attend classes? Attending classes 1-2 times per week is recommended for optimal progress. Are your instructors certified? Yes, all of our instructors are certified and experienced in teaching gymnastics. Do you offer private lessons? Yes, we offer private lessons for individuals or small groups upon request. What is your cancellation policy? We require 24-hour notice for class cancellations to receive a refund or reschedule. Contact Us Name: Email: Message: I accept Privacy policy Send Contact Information +916314532075 JuniorFit@gmail.com Shrimaya Square Building, civil hospital, 62, Kshapnak Marg., opposite madhav nagar, Freeganj, Desai Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India Home About Us Our Programs Prices Private Lessons Contact Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy
pages.policy: Privacy Policy - JuniorFit main { padding: 50px 0; } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } h2{ margin-bottom: 20px; } a{ color: #e54c50; } a:hover{ text-decoration: underline; } JuniorFit Home About Us Our Programs Prices Private Lessons Contact Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Interpretation and Definitions Interpretation The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural. Definitions For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service. Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority. Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to JuniorFit. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet. Service refers to the Website. Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Data Security We take appropriate measures to protect the security of your information. However, please be aware that no data transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of information transmitted to our website. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: JuniorFit@gmail.com By phone number: +916314532075 By mail: Shrimaya Square Building, civil hospital, 62, Kshapnak Marg., opposite madhav nagar, Freeganj, Desai Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India Home About Us Our Programs Prices Private Lessons Contact Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy

You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell, or exploit any portion of the services, use of the services, or access to the services without express written permission by JuniorFit. JuniorFit reserves the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time. JuniorFit and its logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of JuniorFit. They may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of JuniorFit. Your feedback is invaluable and helps us enhance your experience with JuniorFit. If you have any further inquiries or if there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to reach out. We are here to ensure your satisfaction. Thank you for choosing JuniorFit!
